text:
In an ongoing effort to improve the Service, we may automatically collect certain information when end users access and use the Service.
Such information includes, without limitation, IP addresses, browser type and language, referring and exit pages and URLs, date and time, amount of time spent on particular pages, what sections of the Service end users visit, log files, and similar information and data.

In order to provide these features and functionalities while you are using a mobile device, we may, with your consent, automatically collect geolocation information from your mobile device or wireless carrier and/or certain third-party service providers.
Such information is collectively called the " Geolocation Information ."  Collection of such Geolocation Information occurs both when the Service is running on your mobile device and your desktop device.
You may decline to allow us to collect such Geolocation Information, in which case Sparemin will not be able to provide certain features or functionalities to you.
